items.longDescription:
- The matte fabric is suitable for sporty or casual styling.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Chest pocket added for convenience while retaining a sleek look.
- Seamless design* keeps cold air out to keep you warm. *Except at the sides, sleeve undersides, shoulders, and hood.
- Non-bulky cut.
- Seam pockets maintain the sleek look.
- Seamless ribbed cuffs provide an improved fit and keep cold air out.
- The knee length for extra warmth.
- Hood fastener stows inside the collar, ensuring a neat look.
- Waist pocket lined with cozy fleece.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Waterfowl Feathers/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester/ Cuff: 93% Polyester, 7% Spandex
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The matte fabric is suitable for sporty or casual styling.
- Durable water-repellent coating for light rain. *A water-repellent coating is applied to the surface of the fabric for a longer-lasting water-repellent effect.THE FINISH IS NOT PERMANENT.
- Windproof design.
- Lightweight fabric.
- 750+ Fill Power* high quality down. *by DFB Measurement method.
- Updated to allow easy movement around the shoulders while maintaining a smart appearance.
- Updated construction allows the zipper to be stowed inside the collar when the hood is removed, keeping the collar looking sleek.
- Updated to a more versatile single-breasted design with a narrow front placket.
- Now with concealed dot buttons on the pockets to allow easy access while keeping your belongings safe.
- Seamless, stitch-free design keeps cold air out.
- A sleek cut without the usual bulk of a down coat.
- Ribbed cuffs made using a seamless circular knitting technique for an improved fit that keeps cold air out.
- Simple design for business or casual wear.
items.name: SEAMLESS DOWN COAT
items.shortDescription: No quilted stitching means warmth is maintained. Stylish design for business or casual wear. 750+ Fill Power* high quality down.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Front Body: Back Body: From The Waist Up: 90% Down, 10% Waterfowl Feathers/ Mesh: Back Body: From The Waist Down: Sides of The Item: Sleeve: Hood: 70% Polyester, 30% Rayon/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Made with Heat of Absorption padding jointly developed with Toray.
- Crisp outer fabric.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Sleek design with no quilting on the outside.
- Hybrid construction combines the benefits of down and functional padding for warmth, lightness, and a stylish cut.
- Jointly developed with Toray, breathable mesh and ventilation holes keep you comfortable.
- Elastic shirring at the cuffs keeps cold air out.
- Chest pocket can be accessed from inside or outside, allowing easy access without opening the front slide fastener.
- Special textured slide fastener pull for easy fastening and unfastening, even with wet hands.
- Waterproof fasteners on the chest pockets.
- Roomy, relaxed fit, suitable for business or casual wear.
- Practical design with plenty of storage, including outer chest and waist pockets, hand warmers, inner chest pocket, and a waist pocket convenient for storing gloves and other small items.
items.name: HYBRID DOWN COAT
items.shortDescription: A precise combination of high-performance padding and premium down. Suitable for business or casual wear.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean, Do not tumble dry.
